Projects | Blog | GitHub Gist | Contact

My name is Kat, but I mainly go by katsaii or nuxii. I'm a Computer Science student and I work freelance as a game developer. I spend a lot of time working on personal projects and experiments; sometimes hosting their source code on my GitHub page. I tend to jump between many different kinds of programming language, since they all have tools and advantages I'm interested in.

Although I specialise as a systems programmer, I work hard to widen my horizons by learning many new programming languages and computer science topics. Additionally, I'm not just a programmer! I also enjoy drawing and creating music. You can find my art work on my Twitter, SoundCloud, or Newgrounds accounts.
